mapper.insert: insert into user_defined_functions (UDF_NAME, UDF_RETURN_TYPE, UDF_TYPE, UDF_LIBRARY, UDF_USAGE_COUNT) values (#{UDF_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{UDF_RETURN_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{UDF_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{UDF_LIBRARY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{UDF_USAGE_COUNT,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select UDF_NAME, UDF_RETURN_TYPE, UDF_TYPE, UDF_LIBRARY, UDF_USAGE_COUNT from user_defined_functions
